revision.text: [[Pokemon Day Care|Breeding]] is the most effective way to obtain most Shiny [[Pokémon]]. The [[Farm]] can be used to increase both the Egg Steps gained by defeating a Pokémon (thus hatching eggs faster) and the Shiny Rate in general. Below is a table of optimal Shiny strategies along with planting strategies to achieve these strategies. Furthermore, a [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Shiny Breeding Rate Calculator] has been created for more specific calculations of Shiny Rates.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
